masthead: 国际国内新闻·体育新闻

text.text: THE OPENING CEREMONY OF THE FIRST EASTASIAN GAMES IS TO BE HELD AT HONGKOUSTADIUM ON MAY9.
第一届东亚运动会开幕式定于5月9日在虹口体育场举行。
A:The Opening ceremony of the First East AsianGames is to be held at Hongkou stadium on May 9.
第一届东亚运动会开幕式定于5月9日在虹口体育场举行。
B:They are busy preparing for the ceremony now.
他们现在正忙着准备开幕式。
A:I do hope I'll get a ticket.
我真希望有一张开幕式的入场券。
